summary: Thought-provoking documentary on war propaganda: how governments manipulate the facts and how most media let them get away with it.
cast: Julian Assange|Tony Blair|Wilfred Burchett|George W. Bush|Mark Curtis|Stuart Ewen|Melvin Goodman|Denis Halliday|Sean Hannity|Saddam Hussein|Dahr Jamail|Henry Kissinger|David Mannion|Andrew Marr|Ethan McCord|Cynthia McKinney|Benjamin Netanyahu|Richard Nixon|Bill O'Reilly|Barack Obama|Rageh Omaar|Greg Philo|John Pilger|Colin Powell|Dan Rather|Steve Rendall|Scott Ritter|David Rose|Carne Ross|Phil Shiner|Guy Smallman|Fran Unsworth|Bryan Whitman
keywords: fake news|american war crimes|war monger|iraq war|vietnam war
title: La guerra que usted no ve
